title: How to Start a Bracelet Making Business at Home

steps.headline: Don't attract customers with something boring like a lemonade stand.
steps.description: You want something unique and original. Also, you want to be able to sell year round.

steps.headline: Buy the supplies needed to start a new sensation!
In a notebook, write a list of names you want to call your store.
steps.description: Pick your favorite and write with Sharpie the name on poster board. Tape the sign to box or table.

steps.headline: Watch some YouTube videos on 'How to Make Friendship Bracelets'.
In notebook make a list of bracelets the customers can buy with price.
On next page, draw a chart with 5 columns.
First Name, Last Name, Type Of Braid, Colors, and Cost.
steps.description: Next to "Cost" write a little note saying "Please Do Not Write Here". It's for YOU to fill in the total cost.

steps.headline: Put all of your supplies in shoe box.
steps.description: Carry store to bottom of driveway and start taking orders.

text: Don't attract customers with something boring like a lemonade stand. You want something unique and original. Also, you want to be able to sell year round. Buy the supplies needed to start a new sensation!  In a notebook, write a list of names you want to call your store. Pick your favorite and write with Sharpie the name on poster board. Tape the sign to box or table. Watch some YouTube videos on 'How to Make Friendship Bracelets'. Pre-make 5-10. In notebook make a list of bracelets the customers can buy with price.  On next page, draw a chart with 5 columns. Label them: First Name, Last Name, Type Of Braid, Colors, and Cost. Next to "Cost" write a little note saying "Please Do Not Write Here". It's for YOU to fill in the total cost. Put all of your supplies in shoe box. Carry store to bottom of driveway and start taking orders.
sentences: Don't attract customers with something boring like a lemonade stand.
You want something unique and original.
Also, you want to be able to sell year round.
Buy the supplies needed to start a new sensation!
In a notebook, write a list of names you want to call your store.
Pick your favorite and write with Sharpie the name on poster board.
Tape the sign to box or table.
Watch some YouTube videos on 'How to Make Friendship Bracelets'.
In notebook make a list of bracelets the customers can buy with price.
On next page, draw a chart with 5 columns.
Label them: First Name, Last Name, Type Of Braid, Colors, and Cost.
Next to "Cost" write a little note saying "Please Do Not Write Here".
It's for YOU to fill in the total cost.
Put all of your supplies in shoe box.
Carry store to bottom of driveway and start taking orders.
